    ca.mcgill.ecse211.project  

    • Uses of LineDetectorController in ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

      Classes in ca.mcgill.ecse211.project that implement LineDetectorController 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DifferentialLineDetector
      Differential line detector that uses difference between old value and current value implements the line detector controller class
      class  PDifferentialLineDetector
      A line detector that detects lines using a difference in the light levels proportional to their average values.
      class  ProportionalLineDetector
      A simple line detector that detects lines based on a threshold proportional to its initial value.

      Methods in ca.mcgill.ecse211.project with parameters of type LineDetectorController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void WaggleNavigation.waggle(int direction, int side, LineDetectorController detectorL, LineDetectorController detectorR)
      moves forwards until a line is detected, then uses the difference in location to detecting the the same line with the other sensor to correct the angle, it also corrects its position.
